content: My name is Peter Schmidt. I am the landlord of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had a conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang. He is from China and is a student.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for a brand-new, unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price. I offered the apartment to Haoyu Wang at 875 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price agreed upon was 875 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, at 7. He was respectful and willing to negotiate, which I appreciate.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, at no point during the negotiation did I feel discriminated or offended. The conversation was respectful and productive.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point in the negotiation. As I mentioned, the conversation was respectful and both parties were willing to negotiate in good faith.
name: Peter Schmidt
